scripts.build-dev: browserify leaflet-geopackage.js --exclude sqlite3 --exclude lwip --exclude inquirer -o dist/leaflet-geopackage.js
scripts.build-min: browserify leaflet-geopackage.js --exclude sqlite3 --exclude lwip --exclude inquirer | uglifyjs -c -m -o dist/leaflet-geopackage.min.js
scripts.prepublish: browserify leaflet-geopackage.js --exclude sqlite3 --exclude lwip --exclude inquirer -o dist/leaflet-geopackage.js
